snippet: The daughter of Laura Pollán, founder of the dissident group Ladies in White, has split from the organization, signaling divisions over the rapprochement between Cuba and the United States.
abstract: Cuban dissident group Ladies in White splits over disagreement between leader Berta Soler and Laura Maria Labrada, daughter of group's founder; tensions within group have heightened since thaw between Cuba and United States.
lead_paragraph: The daughter of Laura Pollán, founder of the dissident group Ladies in White, has split from the organization, signaling divisions over the rapprochement between Cuba and the United States.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Cuba: Split in Dissident Group
